-- type as `\bbW`
/-- The composition of Frobenius and Verschiebung is multiplication by `p`. -/
theorem frobenius_verschiebung (x : (exprğ•) R) : frobenius (verschiebung x) = x * p :=
  by
  ghost_calc x
  ghost_simp [mul_comm]

    Â· rw [verschiebung_coeff_succ, hi, zero_pow]

theorem coeff_p [CharP R p] (i : â„•) : (p : (exprğ•) R).coeff i = if i = 1 then 1 else 0 :=
